dashboard_plugin_notification.download_the_ANAFES: Download the ANAFES plugin to add & tag news articles into selected companies of your choice.
dashboard_plugin_notification.to_get_fully_feature: to fully experience news monitoring feature!

news_screen_plugin_notification.download_the_ANAFES: Download the ANAFES plugin to add more news articles.
news_screen_plugin_notification.when_browsing: When browsing any news online, the plugin allows you to tag, collect and score this news article on its ESG impact

how_it_works_popup.the_ANAFES_web_plugin: The ANAFES Web Plugin is a web-extension tool that lets its users easily categorize and score any news article that they come across in their research. To use it, follow these steps:
how_it_works_popup.go_to_the_news_article: 2. Go to the news article that you are reading
how_it_works_popup.open_the_ANAFES_web_plugin: 3. Open the ANAFES Web Plugin extension in the top-right corner of your browser
how_it_works_popup.tag_the_article: 4. Tag the article with its appropriate categories
how_it_works_popup.score_the_article: 5. Score the article on its impact to the company's ESG rating
how_it_works_popup.no_firewall: No firewall? Just download off the MS Edge/Chrome Store!

log_in_plugin.invalid_email_or_password: Email or password is invalid, please try again.

why_is_it_not_relevant.this_is_not_related_to: This is not related to the company.
why_is_it_not_relevant.this_is_not_ESG: This is not ESG related news.

score_the_news.does_this_belong_to: Does it belong to any of the following?
